body.p: I am much obliged to you for your note – and also for the Legend. Unidentified You may suppose that I was rather amazed to see it again, in association with you!! It is no disparagement to it to have rejected it. I thought it at the time very good of its kind, but it was not the Household Words kind.

Miss Burdett CouttsAngela Georgina Burdett Coutts (1814-1906, Dictionary of National Biography), philanthropist and close friend of CD, with whom she collaborated on Urania Cottage and other social work projects. has mentioned to me her intention of becoming a subscriber to the Gardeners.CD spoke at the Gardeners’ Benevolent Institution dinner on 14 June; see Pilgrim Letters 6, p. 696 and n.
Tavistock House | Saturday evening | Twenty Sixth June 1852.
